name: Gravels of Endless War
description:
The game is free to play. There won't be loot boxes, advertisements or other p2w elements. But you can be a donater to support and keep the game alive.
The free users can use one game mode, they will be able to create new presets and they will be able to manage their teams.

Donater 1 status
You will be able to purchase the Donater 1 status 1, 2 or 3 months. Users with Donater 1 status will be able to join 2 additional game modes and they will be able to customize their gravels. Their username will be marked with the Donater 1 Tower.


Donater 2 status
If you want to help more than you can purchase the Donater 2 status. It is an additional payment and it is up to you how much you would like to pay. The username of the users with Donater 2 status will be marked with the Donater 2 tower.
